channel.title: Changing item stats
channel.description: how do i change item str bonus cus on my server i want to make it so fighter hat has +3 str bonus and alot of attk could someone tell me how i change the stats of items?

item.title: Changing item stats
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Da Boondocks:

how do i change item str bonus cus on my server i want to make it so fighter hat has +3 str bonus and alot of attk could someone tell me how i change the stats of items?

Bonuses and item stats are the same thing…unless you’re talking about adding a requirement to use/wear an item?
Idk what deob you’re using but for a 317 find the file ‘item.cfg’ and open it. Search for the fighter hat. Change the 2nd to last number to 3 in that row.

Read full topic
